nodes.text: Veruna was one of three moons that orbited the planet of Naboo. It shared its name with King Ars Veruna, who reigned over the Naboo before Padmé Amidala.

Veruna first appeared in Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace and was later identified in the 2017 reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia. In Star Wars Legends, The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia identified the moon as Ohma-D'un.
